sys_properties.description:
Use mailto: Buttons

Setting this to true will cause the "helpful" and "not helpful" buttons from the WtEH tool, to be "mailto:" links, meaning that clicking on them from an email will trigger a new email to be created. When sent, this email will record a response by the user.
This REPLACES the button links that send the user into the platform UI. This means that you will not be able to require comments, so the "require comment when..." settings will no longer apply.
Please be aware that some mobile mail clients (specifically Outlook for mobile) do not have good support for complex mailto: links. If your users use Outlook for mobile heavily, it may be wise to keep this setting disabled. You can read more on this issue, and find a tool I made to fix it for "approval" notifications, here.

Default: false
sys_properties.name: x_13231_helpful_em.use_mailto_buttons
